  • Constructor Details

    • MyProject

      public MyProject​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String description, java.lang.String[] tags, int maxTasks, int maxPart, int maxStudents, int maxFacilitators, int maxPartners)
      Constructor for the project, which receives data for its struture through the use of the template. As requested, throws an IllegalArgumentException if the name, descriptionn or tags are null, or if the maximum number of tasks or participants is negative or zero
      Parameters:
      name - name for the project
      description - a description of what the project entails
      tags - tags that categorize the project
      maxTasks - maximum of tasks per project, as defined in the template
      maxPart - maximum participants in the project, as defined in the template
      maxStudents - maximum students in the project, as defined in the template
      maxFacilitators - maximum facilitators in the project, as defined in the template
      maxPartners - maximum partners in the project, as defined in the template

    • addParticipant

      public void addParticipant​(ma02_resources.participants.Participant participant) throws ma02_resources.project.exceptions.IllegalNumberOfParticipantType, ma02_resources.project.exceptions.ParticipantAlreadyInProject
      Adds a participant to the array, and increments the number of participants of said type for the instance
      Specified by:
      addParticipant in interface ma02_resources.project.Project
      Parameters:
      participant - participant to be added
      Throws:
      ma02_resources.project.exceptions.IllegalNumberOfParticipantType - if the number of participants is at max capacity
      ma02_resources.project.exceptions.ParticipantAlreadyInProject - if the participant is already signed up for the project

    • addTask

      public void addTask​(ma02_resources.project.Task task) throws ma02_resources.project.exceptions.IllegalNumberOfTasks, ma02_resources.project.exceptions.TaskAlreadyInProject
      adds a task to the array, granted it is not existant in the project, and the number of tasks in the array has yet to reach its limit
      Specified by:
      addTask in interface ma02_resources.project.Project
      Parameters:
      task - task to be added to the task array
      Throws:
      ma02_resources.project.exceptions.IllegalNumberOfTasks - if the maximum number of tasks has been reached
      ma02_resources.project.exceptions.TaskAlreadyInProject - if the task is already in the project

    • removeTask

      public void removeTask​(ma02_resources.project.Task task) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      removes a task from the array, granted it is exists in the project.
      Parameters:
      task - task to be added to the task array
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - the task doesn't exist.
